data.text: @Dmitriy_Odinson Hi there! We apologise that you felt that WIZZ let you down. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

data.text: @di_kingz @AthensAirport Hi Dimitris! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

data.text: @Thibaut_NY Hi There! Unfortunately, drones are not accepted on Wizz Air flights regardless of removing batteries or keeping them. Thank you for your understanding.
@wiki_marci Hi Wiki! Yes, you can still take the inbound flight if you missed the outbound. Enjoy your travel!

data.text: @iki_abid Hi There! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

@Lousmith1979 Hi Louise! Please accept our apologies for the delay and late response. You should drop off the baggage and do the airport check-in (if you have to do it at the airport) based on the original time of departure. Please take this into consideration if it is needed next time.

data.text: @patanna @KNightingale4 @bevanoaj @evejonesy @WizzAirUK_W9 @MartinSLewis @financialombuds Hi Anne! We are sorry to hear this. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will assist you as soon as possible: https://t.co/y2HzLdDlzJ.

@chuvaetrovoada @Miles03801687 @Matthew79940523 @ralut10 Hi There! If you are still having the same problem, please choose "compensation" or "welfare" as a title. You will be able to attach the receipts after that. We hope this information will be helpful.

@ldyysw Hi Stuart! After having a short conversation with our virtual assistant, an agent will join the conversation based on availability. We kindly ask for your patience in the meantime. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @AndrewWright_in And, if you need additional information, please contact our Call Centre. Our colleagues also inform the airport in advance, here you can find our numbers: https://t.co/PUjt1keNWL. Once on board, please make the crew aware of your allergies. Thank you for your cooperation!

@AndrewWright_in Hi Andrew! Please be advised that we cannot guarantee a peanut-free aircraft as other passengers may bring their own peanut products on board. We, therefore, recommend that you bring allergy control medicine with you on board and you may take your own food with you as well.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @absbatch03 Hi Abbie! Please accept our apologies for the delay in response. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will assist you as soon as possible: https://t.co/y2HzLdDlzJ.

@KEENANH0HN @BerekmeriMihaly Hi There! Please be informed that on Wizz Air flights, travel documents and implementations regarding vaccination depend on the regulations of the destination country. If the destination country asks for proof of vaccination, passengers will be asked before getting on board.

@Jad3yy_x @WizzAirUK_W9 Hi Jadey! We are sincerely sorry to hear this. Please reply to the email you received from our colleagues regarding your compensation process. They can trace the money back and inform you accordingly. Thank you for your cooperation.

@lysiane54510551 Hi Lysane! It must be only one bag, and cannot be divided. Thank you for your understanding. Enjoy your flight!
